_header: A man of great devotion / Was some time in Religion
_description: A miracle of Our Lady, the Virgin Mary gives her milk to a monk — forty couplets

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines: A Mon of gret deuociunWas sum tyme in Religiun…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat to his blisse he take vs toÞat is and schal ben
                    euer mo. Amen.
